abstract: The move is seen by many to be part of the industry’s wider push to increase competition to iTunes and shift leverage away from Apple.
snippet: The move is seen by many to be part of the industry’s wider push to increase competition to iTunes and shift leverage away from Apple.
lead_paragraph: Signaling another departure from the music industry’s longtime antipiracy strategy, the Universal Music Group will sell a significant portion of its catalog without the customary copy protection software for at least the next few months, the company announced yesterday.

headline.main: Universal Music Will Sell Songs Without Copy Protection
headline.print_headline: Universal to Sell Some Music Without the Piracy Protection

abstract: Little “i”s have proliferated in product names and commercial brands like the iPod and iVillage.
snippet: Little “i”s have proliferated in product names and commercial brands like the iPod and iVillage.
lead_paragraph: MADISON AVENUE is giving a new spin to “I Spy,” the children’s game, by chanting, “I spy, with my little eye, a little ‘i.’ ”

headline.main: For Many Campaigns, the Little i’s Have It
headline.print_headline: For Many Campaigns, the Little i’s Have It
